attributes.action: stop poverty in this country and to offer support to genuine people who suffer with depression or another mental health issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i have worked 12 years on the buses and went through a really bad patch...i was diagnosed with depression which resulted in me being medically retired from work.
i have been offered no support turned down from incapicity benefit and expected to live on £59 a week, my outgoings are more then my ingoings, i find it has added to my depression, and i'm going round in circles. more help and support for the mentally ill please

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
